subtitle: chapter eight the ideal of karmayoga the
grandest idea is the religion of the

those of work love psychology and
knowledge but you must at the same time

only know that there are men who have no
more than mere knowledge these divisions

man we have found that in the end all

all religions and all methods of work

goal I have already tried to point out

is struggling towards freedom from the
atom to the man from the incent lifeless

existence on earth the human soul the

in check our earth is trying to fly away

everything has a tendency to infinite

of action taken is not a proper when we

but the impulse is the same the

oppressed with a knowledge of his
condition of bondage and he wants to get

not possess certain things and he tries

from it so he steals freedom is the one

sentient and consciously or

sane seeks is very different from that

of the infinite unspeakable
bless while that on which the robber has

for a song there is to be found in every

little body when we see a man doing good

cannot be confined within the limited

supposes absolute on selfishness can be

list when he hears this idea

another system he has become one with

Yoga is the attaining through unselfish

in time place in circumstance in one

every thought word or deed that as

can we do good to the world in an

yes no permanent or everlasting good can

if it could be done the world would not

take away pain from the physical plane

just push it from this side to the other

remain so is its very nature this ebb

logical to hold
otherwise is to say that we may have

life if you want to have life you have

again a disturbance comes and again we

this world's wheel within wheel is a

is also possible to come out through

is about God what is the use of

such wide sympathy this great
